org.jwebsocket.plugins.scripting.app

Class BaseScriptApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jwebsocket.plugins.scripting.app.BaseScriptApp
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavaScriptApp

    public abstract class BaseScriptApp
extends Object
    The class represents the global "App" object into script applications. Contains abstract methods to be extended by concrete implementations for custom languages like JavaScript or Groovy.
    Author:
    kyberneees

    • Field Detail

      • EVENT_CONNECTOR_STARTED

        public static final String EVENT_CONNECTOR_STARTED
        String value for the "Connector Started" event. The event is fired when a client started a connection with the server.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_CONNECTOR_STOPPED

        public static final String EVENT_CONNECTOR_STOPPED
        String value for the "Connector Stopped" event. The event is fired when a client stopped a connection with the server.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_ENGINE_STARTED

        public static final String EVENT_ENGINE_STARTED
        String value for the "Engine Started" event. The event is fired when a jWebSocket engine has started.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_ENGINE_STOPPED

        public static final String EVENT_ENGINE_STOPPED
        String value for the "Engine Stopped" event. The event is fired when a jWebSocket engine has stopped.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_SESSION_STARTED

        public static final String EVENT_SESSION_STARTED
        String value for the "Session Started" event. The event is fired when a new client session is created on the server.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_SESSION_STOPPED

        public static final String EVENT_SESSION_STOPPED
        String value for the "Session Stopped" event. The event is fired when an existing client session is stopped(destroyed) on the server.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_LOGON

        public static final String EVENT_LOGON
        String value for the "Logon" event. The event is fired when a client logon.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_LOGOFF

        public static final String EVENT_LOGOFF
        String value for the "Logoff" event. The event is fired when a client logoff.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_TOKEN

        public static final String EVENT_TOKEN
        String value for the "Token" event. The event is fired when a token is received from the client to the script application.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_FILTER_IN

        public static final String EVENT_FILTER_IN
        String value for the "Filter In" event. The event is fired before client tokens arrive to the application controller layer. It is designed to allow pre-filtering.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_FILTER_OUT

        public static final String EVENT_FILTER_OUT
        String value for the "Filter Out" event. The event is fired before application tokens are sent to the client. It is designed to allow post-filtering.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_SYSTEM_STARTING

        public static final String EVENT_SYSTEM_STARTING
        String value for the "System Starting" event. The event is fired when the jWebSocket server system is starting.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_SYSTEM_STARTED

        public static final String EVENT_SYSTEM_STARTED
        String value for the "System Started" event. The event is fired when the jWebSocket server system has started.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_SYSTEM_STOPPING

        public static final String EVENT_SYSTEM_STOPPING
        String value for the "System Started" event. The event is fired when the jWebSocket server system is stopping.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_SYSTEM_STOPPED

        public static final String EVENT_SYSTEM_STOPPED
        String value for the "System Started" event. The event is fired when the jWebSocket server system has stopped.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_BEFORE_APP_RELOAD

        public static final String EVENT_BEFORE_APP_RELOAD
        String value for the "Before App Reload" event. The event is fired before reaload an script application. Allows to applications to perform operations before to be reloaded.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_APP_LOADED

        public static final String EVENT_APP_LOADED
        String value for the "App Loaded" event. The event is fired when an script app has been successfully loaded.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_UNDEPLOYING

        public static final String EVENT_UNDEPLOYING
        String value for the "Undeploying" event. The event is fired when an script app is going to be undeployed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BaseScriptApp

        public BaseScriptApp(ScriptingPlugIn aServer,
             String aAppName,
             String aAppPath,
             ScriptEngine aScriptApp)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        aServer - The ScriptingPlugIn reference that allows to script applications to get access to the TokenServer instance.
        aAppName - The application name (unique value)
        aAppPath - The application directory path
        aScriptApp - The scripting engine that runs the application

      • getBeanFactory

        public org.springframework.context.support.GenericApplicationContext getBeanFactory(String aNamespace)
        Gets the Spring bean factory instance associated to the given namespace. If 'namespace' argument is null, then the system core bean factory is returned. The system core bean factory is the parent of name-spaced bean factories, so system core beans are visible for every namespaced bean factory.
        Parameters:
        aNamespace -
        Returns:
